summary: An Ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 3354 for the improvement of Bothell Way, as laid off and extended by Ordinance No. 39782, from 10th Avenue Northeast to the north margin of East 85th Street; and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues; all in the City of Seattle, under Ordinance No. 41374, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
